verses.roman:
manur vā indra-sāvarṇiś
caturdaśama eṣyati
uru-gambhīra-budhādyā
indra-sāvarṇi-vīryajāḥ

synonyms: manuḥ—the Manu; vā—either; indra-sāvarṇiḥ—Indra-sāvarṇi; caturdaśamaḥ—fourteenth; eṣyati—will become; uru—Uru; gambhīra—Gambhīra; budha-ādyāḥ—and others, such as Budha; indra-sāvarṇi—of Indra-sāvarṇi; vīrya-jāḥ—born of the semen.
translation: The name of the fourteenth Manu will be Indra-sāvarṇi. He will have sons like Uru, Gambhīra and Budha.
